title: Intelligent Systems

segmentation: So, ladies and gentlemen, thank you very much for the opportunity to present the Intelligent Systems Conference.

And of course, including applications cause this theory and told this computer programs, systems and so on are applicable for different types of applications in economy, education, banking and so forth.
This year we have a two day program.

For example.
Activity recognition, then a number of security applications scheduling in electricity production.
Agents, so a lot of interesting theoretical and practical applications in the area of intelligent systems.
Thank you very much.
